virophage.network

Class PacketStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • virophage.network.PacketStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class PacketStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Represents a continuous stream of Packet objects, abstracting away the Network client and server.
    Since:
    2014-05-16
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PacketStream(java.net.Socket socket)
      Create a duplex PacketStream from a socket.
